creditline: Gift of funds from Barbara S. Longfellow in honor of John Skogmo and Tom Morin
dimension:
7 1/8 × 10 9/16 in. (18.1 × 26.83 cm) (plate, sheet, trimmed at edges)
7 3/8 × 10 3/4 in. (18.73 × 27.31 cm) (mount, strips along edges of sheet)
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [1623] and [2351]
markings: LRC, on strip at edge of sheet: collector's stamp of Friedrich August von Sachsen (Lugt 971).
provenance: Friedrich August von Sachsen (Lugt 971). Boerner sale in Leipzig in May 1933, lot no. 637. (E. H. Ariëns Kappers Masterprints, Amsterdam, Master Prints 2015, no. 19, illus.); sold to MIA, 2015.
title: A Forest Marsh with Travelers on a Bank
